__TOC__

* Contact: RobertToscano
* Make: Compaq
* Brand: Presario
* Series: V2000
* Model: V2140US

=== Current Issues ===
* Built-in mute button is functional, but indicator light does not turn on
* Wireless button is functional, but indicator light does not turn on
* Hibernate sometimes fails: when awoken from hibernate, it sometimes ignores the swap and boots up to login screen
* Sometimes fails to awaken from standby
